attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP
attributes.review: This app took my information and hacked into my refrigerator and stole all of the food out of it! It also turned my cat into a robot and now it shoots lasers! It also sends about 200 notifications an hour and is so annoying. They also spam my email 20 times a day. If i could give this app 0 stars I would. Stan Joe Biden for clear skin.

attributes.title: Very Upsetting
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support the president of the USA, but later realized this is a bad app. I cannot stress how upsetting it is to get Henti ads in front of my children, and grandchildren. The tentacles is where I draw the line and it seems as the app itself does not care for the well being of the users. Will NOT be downloading again after deletion.

attributes.title: THE WORST APP
attributes.review: I just got done downloading this app and I barley open it and I immediately started getting glitches which was weird I decided to keep the app for a little longer but my phone just kept on glitching I just assumed it was my phone acting up but when I deleted the app my phone was getting back to normal I advise you TO NOT DELETE THE APP BECAUSE ITS CAUSING GLITCHES AND IYS RUINING YOUR PHONE.

This app is so bad that it almost makes me want to wear a mask...almost. I also got bit or stung by something and it hurts. Werenâ€™t you supposed to prevent that stuff dude?? Anyways, eat the booty like groceries and remember to swallow. Peace out.

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: I went to get this app to what the big Cheeto himself was bumbling about today, but the app crashed my phone, stole my car, ate my family, and then drained my bank account. Then the man himself showed up at my door to leave a dookie on the doorstep, but ran away when he saw my doorbell camera. All in all a terrible app, would not reccomend
